SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<GameEvent>
public class Game extends Object implements EventEmitter<GameEvent>
It manages an entire game: from player joining to decreeing winners. It defines PlayerData for each PlayerProfile by looking on choices made.
See Also:
  • PlayerData
  • PlayerProfile

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int id, int maxPlayers) throws InvalidMaxPlayersException
      Constructs a new Game and set id and maxPlayers fields. Board is set with standard decks (40 cards per each deck).
      Parameters:
      id - the unique id of the game
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players that can play this game
      Throws:
      InvalidMaxPlayersException - if maxPlayers is not between 2 and 4
      See Also:
      • Board

    • Game

      public Game(int id, int maxPlayers, Board board) throws InvalidMaxPlayersException
      Constructs a new Game and set id, maxPlayers and Board fields. This constructor is used to create a new game with custom decks. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if maxPlayers is not between 2 and 4
      Parameters:
      id - the unique id of the game
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players that can play this game
      board - the board of the game, that includes all FaceUpCard and Deck
      Throws:
      InvalidMaxPlayersException - if maxPlayers is not between 2 and 4
      See Also:
      • Board

      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Returns:
      the maximum number of players that can play this game

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame() throws IllegalGameStateException
      This method permits to pause the game, if it is not already SUSPENDED. No action will be performed while SUSPENDED status is set.
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - is the current GameStatus is already GameStatus.SUSPENDED
      See Also:
      • GameStatus

    • setRestoringStatus

      public void setRestoringStatus() throws IllegalGameStateException
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame() throws IllegalGameStateException
      This method permits to resume the game, if it is SUSPENDED. The previous valid status will be recovered. No action will be performed while SUSPENDED status is not set.
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - is the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.SUSPENDED or GameStatus.RESTORING
      See Also:
      • GameStatus

    • join

      public void join(PlayerProfile pp) throws IllegalGameStateException, PlayerAlreadyPlayingException
      This method add a new PlayerProfile to game, and performs status transition if there are maxPlayers players joined.
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of new player
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.AWAITING_PLAYERS
      PlayerAlreadyPlayingException - if the specified PlayerProfile try to join a game in which he is already playing

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws IllegalGameStateException, NotEnoughPlayersException
      This method permits to start the game (set SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE status), despite there aren't yet connected maxPlayers players. Game starts automatically as soon as the maximum threshold of connected players is reached
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.AWAITING_PLAYERS
      NotEnoughPlayersException - if someone try to start a game with only 1 player

    • selectStartingCardSide

      public void selectStartingCardSide(PlayerProfile pp, Side s) throws DoubleChoiceException, IllegalGameStateException, PlayerNotInGameException
      This method performs a player choice: starting card side choice. Starting card is also placed on PlayArea of player pp, on side s. If all players have chosen side, this method performs status transition.
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of player tha want to choose
      s - the chosen side of starting card
      Throws:
      DoubleChoiceException - if the player has already chosen the starting card side
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the specified PlayerProfile is not in game

    • selectColor

      public void selectColor(PlayerProfile pp, PlayerColor pc) throws IllegalGameStateException, PlayerNotInGameException
      This method performs a player choice: color choice. If all players have chosen their color, this method performs status transition.
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of player that want to choose
      pc - the PlayerColor chosen by player pp
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.SETUP_COLOR
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the specified PlayerProfile is not in game

    • selectObjective

      public void selectObjective(PlayerProfile pp, Objective o) throws IllegalGameStateException, PlayerNotInGameException, DoubleChoiceException, InvalidObjectiveException
      This method performs a player choice: objective choice. If all players have chosen their secret objective, this method performs status transition.
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of player that want to choose
      o - the Objective chosen by player pp
      Throws:
      DoubleChoiceException - if the player has already chosen the secret objective
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.SETUP_OBJECTIVE
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the specified PlayerProfile is not in game
      InvalidObjectiveException - if the specified Objective is not a possible choice

    • drawCard

      public DrawResult drawCard(PlayerProfile pp, DrawSource ds) throws IllegalMoveException, PlayerNotInGameException
      This method allow player pp to draw a card from DrawSource ds, only if source is not empty and game is in compatible status (PLAY or SECOND_LAST_TURN) and compatible turn phase (DRAWING). Notice that in LAST_TURN status, players are not allowed to draw cards: drawing a card on last turn is useless because it is an action that doesn't affect the current turn. It also manages status, turn phase transition and set next player
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of player that want to draw
      ds - the DrawSource from where to get the card
      Returns:
      the result of drawing
      Throws:
      IllegalTurnException - if it's not the turn of the specified PlayerProfile
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is neither GameStatus.PLAY nor GameStatus.SECOND_LAST_TURN or the current TurnPhase is not TurnPhase.DRAWING
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the specified PlayerProfile is not in game
      IllegalMoveException
      See Also:
      • DrawSource
      • DrawResult
      • TurnPhase
      • GameStatus

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(PlayerProfile pp, Card c, Side s, int i, int j) throws IllegalMoveException, PlayerNotInGameException, CardNotInHandException, IllegalPlacementException
      This method allow player pp to place a card on his PlayArea on coordinates i and j, only if placement is valid, game is in compatible status (PLAY, SECOND_LAST_TURN or LAST_TURN) and compatible turn phase (DRAWING) and player have the card c on his hand. It also manages status, turn phase transition and set next player (if needed)
      Parameters:
      pp - the PlayerProfile of player that want to place
      c - the Card to be placed
      s - the visible Side of the placement
      i - the coordinate i of the placement
      j - the coordinate j of the placement
      Throws:
      IllegalTurnException - if it's not the turn of the specified PlayerProfile
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not a playing state or the current TurnPhase is not TurnPhase.PLACING
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the specified PlayerProfile is not in game
      CardNotInHandException - if the player does not have the specified Card in his hand
      IllegalPlacementException - if the specified position is not a playable position
      IllegalMoveException
      See Also:
      • TurnPhase
      • GameStatus
      • PlayerData
      • PlayArea
      • PlayArea.CardPlacement

    • getWinners

      public List<PlayerProfile> getWinners() throws IllegalGameStateException
      This method provides winners, only if game status is set to FINISHED
      Returns:
      a list that contains all winners of the game. It is based on total scores
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.FINISHED
      See Also:
      • getTotalScores
      • GameStatus

    • getTotalScores

      public Map<PlayerProfile,Integer> getTotalScores() throws IllegalGameStateException
      This method provides total score for each player, only if game status is set to FINISHED
      Returns:
      a map that contains all total scores
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the current GameStatus is not GameStatus.FINISHED

    • undoLastPlacement

      public void undoLastPlacement(PlayerProfile pp) throws NotUndoableOperationException
      This method permits to undo the last placement of a player
      Parameters:
      pp - the player that wants to undo the last placement
      Throws:
      NotUndoableOperationException - if the player has not placed any card yet

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(PlayerProfile pp)
      This method handles disconnection of a player for each game phase
      Parameters:
      pp - the player that has disconnected

    • handleReconnection

      public void handleReconnection(PlayerProfile player) throws PlayerNotInGameException, PlayerAlreadyConnectedException
      This method handles reconnection of a player for each game phase
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has reconnected
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInGameException - if the player wasn't in this game
      PlayerAlreadyConnectedException - if the player was already connected

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected(PlayerProfile pp)
      This method tells if a player is connected or not
      Parameters:
      pp - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is connected, false otherwise

      public void setPlayerConnection(PlayerProfile pp, boolean isConnected)
      This method sets the connection status of a player
      Parameters:
      pp - the player to set the connection status
      isConnected - the new connection status
